name: vanilla-cookbook
description: Vanilla Cookbook is a self-hosted recipe manager tailored for simple, ingredient-focused cooking. It lets users store, categorize, and browse recipes through a clean web interface.

features.title: Recipe Storage
features.description: Store recipes with ingredients, instructions, and cooking notes

features.title: Simple Interface
features.description: Navigate a clean, minimalist interface focused on cooking essentials

features.title: Ingredient Focus
features.description: Organize recipes by key ingredients for easy meal planning

features.title: Category System
features.description: Categorize recipes by type, cuisine, or custom categories

features.title: Search and Filter
features.description: Find recipes quickly using search by name or ingredients

features.title: Recipe Browsing
features.description: Browse your recipe collection with filtering and sorting options

features.title: Mobile Responsive
features.description: Access recipes from kitchen tablets or phones with responsive design

features.title: Image Support
features.description: Add photos to recipes for visual reference while cooking
